channel.title: Spadi on Luca Bruno blog
channel.description: Recent content in Spadi on Luca Bruno blog

item.title: Spadi source code
item.description: Hello, after I’ve written really a few docs, and cleaned up some stuff, I’ve published the code of both Spadi and Corraza on gitorious here. In the while, I’ve added support for floors and closeable views. Help… help is needed. Stay tuned.

item.title: Constructing a free ArchiCAD alternative
item.description: Hello, together a couple of university mates we talked about a possible free (as in freedom) ArchiCAD alternative. There are several free CAD out there but none is free for architects/engineers. The project is too big and ambitious, but I wanted to give OpenGL a shot with this excuse to learn something new. I’ve started two projects: Corraza, the OpenGL framework for editing 3d objects and exporting the scene graph to ray tracing software… think about a very very very minimal blender but as library
